Container.Name: wh-plausible-ce
Container.Overview: Simple, open source, lightweight and privacy-friendly web analytics alternative to Google Analytics.
Container.Requires: Plausible requires: - A PostgreSQL 15+ database. - A ClickHouse 24 database.
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "sleep 10 && /entrypoint.sh db createdb && /entrypoint.sh db migrate && /entrypoint.sh run"

Config.Name: Plausible web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Plausible listens on.

Config.Name: BASE_URL
Config.Description: Configures the base URL to use in link generation.

Config.Name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
Config.Description: Configures the secret used for sessions in the dashboard.

Config.Name: TOTP_VAULT_KEY
Config.Description: Configures the secret used for encrypting TOTP secrets at rest using AES256-GCM.

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Configures the secret used for encrypting TOTP secrets at rest using AES256-GCM.

Config.Name: CLICKHOUSE_DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Configures the URL for ClickHouse database, e.g. http://HOST:PORT/DATABASENAME

Config.Name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
Config.Description: The Client Secret from the Google API Console for your project.

Config.Name: MAXMIND_LICENSE_KEY
Config.Description: To use MaxMind you need to create an 'maxmind.com' account.
